name: Pungent Vial
description:
"A potent reminder of our beautiful swamp."
—Laewyn

name: Silent Conch Shell
description:
"Try as you might, this one is soundless."
—Eona

name: Amulet of Thorns
description:
"Thorns can be as beautiful as they are painful."
—Diantha

name: Half-Melted Amulet
description:
"Almost fire resistant. Almost."
—Bordekka

name: Thorn Bracelet
description:
"Coming from the darkness they just grow like that."
—Alarin

name: Stolen Bandit Shell
description:
"They won't be using these on us anytime soon."
—Hua'racche

name: Petrified Wind Rider Eye
description:
"It almost looks like it's watching you."
—Aidem

name: Shiny Thing Tracker
description:
"Don't worry. I won't sell your personal data to another lab."
—Zippti

name: Terebinth Loop
description:
"Just a small piece of the Terebinth's power."
—Leigheara

name: Stolen Bandit Shoelace
description:
"Let's see them run after us now!"
—Hua'racche

name: Aethervolt Pigmentation Reference Guide
description:
"Three of my own discoveries are right there on the cover."
—Aerixx

name: Trade Agreement
description:
"Pretty detailed trade agreement for a bunch of bandits. The Inquest must have written it."
—Mathair

name: Cracked Golem Eye
description:
"Just imagine the crack as your targeting sight."
—Nessi

name: Seraph Medal of Honor
description:
"Some folks just survive in modern warfare. People who thrive in it wear these."
—Goran

name: Cracked Golem Eye
description:
"Nothing I build would crack like this, but it'll work."
—Nessi

name: Stolen Bandit Button
description:
"Was hoping to get weapons or food. Got this instead."
—Hua'racche

name: Seraph Medal of Honor
description:
"Only those who go above and beyond the call of duty earn the right to wear these."
—Goran

name: Caer Astorea Defend Emblem
description:
"Your strength and bravery are inspirations to us all."
—Warden Llew

name: Stolen Bandit Fork
description:
"This is the smallest trident I've ever seen."
—Hua'racche

name: Broken Shackle
description:
"Too bad we can't put them back on the people that made them."
—Coydd

name: Krait Tooth Pendant
description:
"We use these teeth as inspiration for our spears, you can see how deadly all those little ridges are. Use you enemies against themselves."
—Yoal

name: Mysterious Floating Rocks
description:
"Maybe you'll run into someone that knows why these are floating."
—Warden Brulians

name: Aethervolt Pigmentation Reference Guide
description:
"If you ever find yourself surrounded by a group of hylek pointing spears at you, you'll want this."
—Aerixx

name: Painted Battle Jar
description:
"We hold our war paint in this jar. When the battle is over we give to the hero, in this case, that would be you."
—Atzintli

name: Dried Seed Pod
description:
"Seed pods remind us of those who have not yet awakened."
—Diantha

name: Reassignment Papers
description:
"I might be stuck here, but you don't need to be."
—Lionguard Hester

name: Bag of Worm Food
description:
"Good for worms, and good for you!"
—Sneckit

name: Broken Destroyer Trap
description:
"Only works once, but at least it works!"
—Bordekka

name: Terebinth Loop
description:
"Even the smallest sapling can still be useful."
—Leigheara

name: Seraph Medal of Stealth
description:
"Being quiet means staying alive."
—Morina

name: Broken Destroyer Trap
description:
"Destroyers came; we were ready."
—Bordekka

name: Broken Shackle
description:
"Fortunately, they're poorly constructed."
—Coydd

name: Stolen Bandit Shell
description:
"If only we had a way to fire them back."
—Hua'racche

name: Stolen Bandit Buckle
description:
"Almost perfect size to throw."
—Hua'racche

name: Petrified Wind Rider Eye
description:
"Amazingly well preserved."
—Aidem

name: Engraved Sea Shell
description:
"This is the prettiest one I have ever found."
—Harvester Mavad

name: Stolen Bandit Buckle
description:
"I bet these are really important. Not to me, though."
—Hua'racche

name: Thorny Prison Key
description:
"These wont unlock anything else, but they do grow in a pretty pattern."
—Tovar

name: Ancient Emblem
description:
"Looks really old. I wonder where it came from."
—Rhea

name: Friendship Shell
description: It's shaped like a hug.

name: Moss Woven Charm
description:
"A reminder of the power inside yourself."
—Arias

name: Amulet of Thorns
description:
"A thorn is only as dangerous as you are careless."
—Diantha

name: Skritt Necklace
description:
"I don't think it would fit your neck."
—Mrr'kkant

name: Twitchok's Blueprints
description:
"What do you mean, 'it's just a bunch of scribbles?'"
—Twitchok

name: Twitchok's Blueprints
description:
"I'm positive this will work. Unlike the last few..."
—Twitchok

name: Terebinth Leaf
description:
"Just holding it makes me feel better."
—Leigheara

name: Dried Seed Pod
description:
"Even the tallest tree starts as a tiny seed."
—Diantha

name: Half-Melted Amulet
description:
"This one lasted longer than the rest."
—Bordekka

name: Sun God Totem
description: <c=@flavor>"May the sun god's rays warm your back."—Qoetl</c>

name: Stolen Bandit Fork
description:
"I guess it's a weapon for really small people?"
—Hua'racche

name: Stolen Bandit Button
description:
"Not shiny enough for me. Might be good for you."
—Hua'racche

name: Trade Agreement
description:
"Looks like the bandits, Inquest, and Nightmare Court are working together?"
—Mathair

name: Stolen Bandit Shoelace
description:
"You need these more than I do. I don't wear shoes."
—Hua'racche

name: Triforged Ring
description:
"Nothing can stand against our combined power."
—Rhea

name: Ring of the Sun-God
description: <c=@flavor>"The ring of the Sun-God will bring you power and perception."—Qoetl</c>

name: Skritt Nobility Emblem
description:
"If anyone asks, you didn't get it from me."
—Mrr'kkant

name: Triforged Ring
description:
"Between the three of us, there's nothing we can't handle."
—Rhea

name: Tiny Troll Runestone
description:
"The trolls weave these in their hair. I can't explain it. Maybe they may have some magical powers."
—Lionguard Cern

name: Moss-Covered Emblem
description:
"Got to admit, I get a wierd feeling whenever I hold it."
—Issa

name: Ancient Scroll
description: <c=@flavor>This scroll describes some practices of the ancient druids.</c>

name: Shiny Button
description:
"So shiny! You want it, yes? You won't find shinier!"
—Mrr'kkant

name: Sylvari Warden Wall Watcher Badge
description: <c=@flavor>"We stop the undead advance here at the Caer Brier wall." -Brannen</c>

name: Vigil Badge
description: <c=@flavor>"You were just the unpredictable variable we needed to turn the tide of undead. The Vigil will remember your service." -Jezza</c>

name: Hylek Scout Telescope
description: <c=@flavor>"The best tribe scouts use this to watch for the undead. Be warned, when the shore looks empty, they rise out of the water." -Potatlan</c>

name: Terebinth Leaf
description:
"You can still feel magic pulsing through it's veins."
—Leigheara

name: Giant Troll Tooth
description: <c=@flavor>"There are far to many trolls here. Take a tooth from the big one if you wish." -Quennida</c>

name: Vigil Badge
description: <c=@flavor>"You were just the unpredictable variable we needed to turn the tide of undead. The Vigil will remember your service." -Jezza</c>

name: Ring of the Sun-God
description: <c=@flavor>"The ring of the Sun-God will bring you power and perception."—Qoetl</c>

name: Lionguard Shipwreck Souvieneer
description: <c=@flavor>"These wrecks were from Lion's Arch. I'd not mistake the mark of the Lionguard." -Danu</c>

name: Seraph Medal of Stealth
description:
"Sneaking up on someone is easy. Keeping others from noticing you is the hard part."
—Morina

name: Ancient Emblem
description:
"Do you think it might be older than the dragons?"
—Rhea

name: Troll Tooth Necklace
description: <c=@flavor>"Trolls attack anything that comes near and eat almost anything. Their teeth are very strong, but make a nice necklace." -Quennida</c>

name: Skritt Nobility Emblem
description:
"Usually only nobles wear these, but I just found a ton of 'em."
—Mrr'kkant

name: Ancient Arcane Scroll
description: <c=@flavor>This scroll describes some practices of the ancient druids.</c>

name: Bag of Worm Food
description:
"Tasty! Try it and see!"
—Sneckit

name: Twitching Undead Hand
description: <c=@flavor>"Need a hand? Sorry, I don't get out much."—Kamma</c>

name: Lionguard Shipwreck Souvieneer
description: <c=@flavor>"These wrecks were from Lion's Arch. I'd not mistake the mark of the Lionguard." -Danu</c>

name: Beaded Hylek Bracelet
description: <c=@flavor>"We like to give our friends these!" -Costi Atl</c>

name: Giant Troll Tooth
description: <c=@flavor>"There are far to many trolls here. Take a tooth from the big one if you wish." -Quennida</c>

name: Undead Ash in a Jar
description: <c=@flavor>"Guaranteed to ward off undead!"—Cuadinti</c>

name: Undead Ash in a Jar
description: <c=@flavor>"Guaranteed to ward off undead!"—Cuadinti</c>

name: Quaggan Seaweed Doll
description: <c=@flavor>Ugh. It smells funny out of water.</c>

name: Shiny Asura Crystal Matrix
description:
"Scholar told me all about matrixes and arcane stuffs. I couldn't listen because of how shiny this shiny is."
—Sik'klak

name: Dried Poisonous Swamp Fungi
description:
"It's dried, so the poison won't affect you. Just don't get it wet."
—Laudren

name: Quaggan Seaweed Doll
description: <c=@flavor>Ugh. It smells funny out of water.</c>

name: Sun God Totem
description: <c=@flavor>"May the sun god's rays warm your back."—Qoetl</c>

name: Asura Gate Tuning Crystal
description:
"Be careful with that! It's very fragile."
—Glaxx

name: Beaded Hylek Necklace
description: A beaded Hylek Necklace

name: Beaded Hylek Bracelet
description: <c=@flavor>"We like to give our friends these!" -Costi Atl</c>

name: Dried Poisonous Swamp Fungi
description:
"It's dried, so the poison won't affect you. Just don't get it wet."
—Laudren

name: Inquest Targeting Reticle
description:
"I've already learned everything I can from it."
—Wistt

name: Shiny Button
description:
"You're lucky day! I usually keep things this shiny."
—Mrr'kkant

name: Oola's Beacon Crystal
description: <c=@flavor>The crystal is old, but still glows faintly with power.</c>

name: Hylek Scout Telescope
description: <c=@flavor>"The best tribe scouts use this to watch for the undead. Be warned, when the shore looks empty, they rise out of the water." -Potatlan</c>

name: Lucky Hylek Fishbone
description: <c=@flavor>"I'm pretty sure these are corruption free." —Ayomichi</c>

name: Dented Canthan Chalice
description:
"If these Canthan chalices were worth something I could have packed up and left long ago."
—Admiral Clarinda Demard

name: Twitching Undead Hand
description: <c=@flavor>"Need a hand? Sorry, I don't get out much."—Kamma</c>

name: Dented Canthan Chalice
description:
"If these Canthan chalices were worth something I could have packed up and left long ago."
—Admiral Clarinda Demard

name: Hardened Destroyer Core
description: <c=@flavor>This trinket grows hotter when in proximity to destroyers.</c>

name: Otherworldly Gear
description:
"This looks unlike any type of gear we've seen before."
—Gatekeeper

name: Asura Gate Tuning Crystal
description:
"Don't get any funny ideas. Only trained techs can replace a gate crystal."
—Glaxx

name: Vigil Commendation for Logistics Excellence
description:
"For getting what we needed to where we needed it, despite the hardship."
—Explorer Pentt

name: Pact Weapon Blueprints
description:
"I don't expect you to understand the details, just the high-level genius behind these designs."
—Whispers Creator Pixtor

"I don't expect you to understand the details, just the high level genius behind these designs."
—Whispers Creator Pixtor

name: Otherworldly Shadow Gear
description:
"This looks unlike any type of gear we've seen before."
—Gatekeeper

name: Stolen Launch Codes
description:
"These seem to be expired. Not good for launch anything but a conversation."
—Lightbringer Krentch

name: Inquest Targeting Reticle
description:
"Amateurish at best, but it's better than nothing."
—Wistt

name: Moss-Covered Emblem
description:
"I feel like I've seen these markings somewhere before."
—Issa

name: Troll Tooth Necklace
description: <c=@flavor>"Trolls attack anything that comes near and eat almost anything. Their teeth are very strong, but make a nice necklace." -Quennida</c>

name: Skritt Necklace
description:
"Looks like a good ring for you."
—Mrr'kkant

name: Mop Of Avenging
description:
"Pollution clean-up efforts are often tiresome, thankless affairs. You need a friend in times like these. So, here you go."
—Carmel

name: Vigil Battle Guide: Risen
description:
"If you know where to point the edge of your blade—you have read enough."
—Vigil Tactician Blazefur

name: Experimental Golem Core
description:
"This one was successful—unlike the experiment of me coming out here.."
—Krewe Apprentice Blork

name: Stolen Launch Codes
description:
"These seem to be expired. Not good for launch anything but a conversation."
—Lightbringer Krentch

name: Early Asura Relief Rubbing
description: <c=@flavor>"These patterns must date all the way back to when Orr was still a thriving place."</c>

name: Eco Mission Statement
description:
"I don't know much about the Inquest or technology, but you don't need to know anything to make a difference."
—Environmental Activist Jenrys

name: Metamystic Study Guide
description:
"We prefer a more hands-on approach to our teachings. This study guide is actually more of a safety manual."
—Professor Gahf

name: Marching Orders
description:
"A good soldier follows orders. A great soldier doesn't question them."
—Zara

name: Block of Ice
description: Event Item

description:

—Researcher Kaii
